nodes.text: The Ambush of the Leafar occurred in 0 ABY when forces of the Galactic Empire ambushed a Leafar merchant convoy at an important transfer point near the Leafar system. Five Rebel X-wing starfighters were present and began attacking the Imperial forces so as to buy time for the Leafar to escape. Further Rebel reinforcements were then called in for support.
This event is portrayed in Operation 16B (Support for Possible Allies) of the Star Wars: X-Wing expansion, Imperial Pursuit.
